name: SH-TDN
description:
The desktop is peaceful as usual.
In order to delete the computer virus called "Agape", the anti-virus program, Virus Buster "Goyou", must cooperate with it while searching through the computer's files.

This game was created by 旨味まづ (Umami Mazu) and the circle 丸得基地 (Marutoku Kichi).
This game was developed in RPGMaker MZ for Windows platforms.
It's a simple game where all you do is talk and walk.
Genre: ADV
Playtime: ~2-3 hours

of Endings: 3
